product_name: Pacsafe MetroSafe 50 GII Anti-Theft Phone & Camera Case - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Protect your digital items from pickpockets and bag slashers with the MetroSafe 50 GII Anti-Theft Phone & Camera Case from PacSafe. It features a slashproof body and strap. Pouch can be worn slung around the neck or over the shoulder, or attached to a belt. Body incorporates eXomesh(R) slash guard, a stainless-steel mesh inside the fabric layers. Slashproof Carrysafe(R) shoulder strap prevents slash-and-run theft. Zippered main compartment features a flap with a smart hook and rip-and-stick with buckle closure. Soft lining protects electronic devices. Internal pocket stows the neck strap when you wear the pouch on a belt. PacSafe MetroSafe 50 GII Anti-Theft Phone & Camera Case features a headphone port so you can listen while your device is securely stowed. Closeout.
short_description: Protect your digital items from pickpockets and bag slashers with the MetroSafe 50 GII Anti-Theft Phone & Camera Case from PacSafe. It features a slashproof body and strap.
